title: Elementary Science Instructional Design Workshop Using Virtual Ecosystem Ponds

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic ecology concepts and experience utilizing VR technology
context.additional_context: An intensive hands-on course for pre-service or in-service teachers to strengthen competencies in designing elementary science education based on virtual ecological pond simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more ecological interaction scenarios using a virtual reality-based pond ecosystem simulation tool.
Learners can develop two instructional activities that foster students' inquiry-based learning by applying situated learning theory.
They can create a virtual environment assessment rubric that effectively conveys ecological conservation concepts.

resources: Web-Based Virtual Pond Ecosystem Simulation Software

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
